title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8003.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8003.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 81. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 81 between the New York - Pennsylvania
state line and the Broome-Cortland county line in the City of Binghamton, Village of Whitney Point, and Towns of Kirkwood, Dickinson, Chenango, Barker, Triangle and Lisle. (b) IR 88. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 88 between Route 12A and the

Broome-Chenango county line in the Towns of Chenango, Fenton and

Colesville. (c) Route 17. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 17 between the Tioga- Broome county
line and the Broome-Delaware county line in the City of Binghamton, Villages of

Johnson City, Windsor and Deposit, and Towns of Kirkwood, Windsor, Sanford, Vestal, Union and Dickinson. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8003.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
